tchWebsites.name: Syniks.com
tchWebsites.description: Syniks.com is a website & dashboard made for the Syniks discord bot. Syniks is a multi-purpose bot made to level up your community's experience in Discord.

tchWebsites.name: Infamous-Gaming.co.uk
tchWebsites.description: Infamous-Gaming.co.uk is mainly forums made for the Infamous Gaming Garry's Mod game servers, it also serves functionality as a store.

tchWebsites.name: Hellstorm-Networks.com
tchWebsites.description: The all-in-one place for CSGO. We provide self grinded accounts, alt generation and cheats for CSGO. Hassle free and straight to the point purchasing while maintaining tools to keep your play to par.

tchDiscordBots.name: Syniks
tchDiscordBots.description: Syniks is a multi-purpose bot made to level up your community's experience in Discord.

tchDiscordBots.name: The Code Hub
tchDiscordBots.description: Bot for The Code Hub that handles autoroles and user verification.

tchDiscordServers.name: Infamous Gaming
tchDiscordServers.description: Infamous Gaming Garry's Mod game servers.

tchDiscordServers.name: Syniks
tchDiscordServers.description: Support server made for the Syniks discord bot. Syniks is a multi-purpose bot made to level up your community's experience in Discord.

tchDiscordServers.name: Hellstorm Networks
tchDiscordServers.description: The all-in-one place for CSGO. We provide self grinded accounts, alt generation and cheats for CSGO. Hassle free and straight to the point purchasing while maintaining tools to keep your play to par.

tchDiscordServers.name: GmodTools
tchDiscordServers.description: Gmod Tools is primarily a website that offers Garry's Mod server tools to developers however it also offers rust, minecraft and markdown tools.

tchDiscordServers.name: The Code Hub
tchDiscordServers.description: The Code Hub is a community server targeted at developers of all levels and backgrounds, we offer a place to hang out with other developers alike, a place to share almost anything including your programming projects and of course code support.
